eme

Class EnsembleClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.classifier.meta.MultiLabelMetaLearner
        • eme.EnsembleClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class EnsembleClassifier
extends mulan.classifier.meta.MultiLabelMetaLearner
    Author:
    Jose M. Moyano: jmoyano@uco.es Class implementing the ensemble classifier which EME uses, i.e., an ensemble where each classifier uses only a subset of the labels.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner[] Ensemble
      Array of classifiers that form the ensemble
      protected byte[][] EnsembleMatrix
      Binary matrix that identifies the ensemble
      protected weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.Remove[] Filters
      Filter to remove the non-active labels
      protected byte[] genotype
      Individual genotype that identifies the individual
      protected int maxSubsetSize
      Max number of active labels in a base classifier
      protected mulan.data.MultiLabelInstances multilabelDatasetTrain
      Dataset to build the classifier
      protected int numClassifiers
      Number of base classifiers in the ensemble
      protected net.sf.jclec.util.random.IRandGen randGen
      Random numbers generator
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Serialization constant
      protected int[] SizeSubsets
      Size of the subset of labels of each base classifier At the moment, all subsets are the same size, but in the future it could be variable
      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner> tableClassifiers
      Table that stores all base classifiers built
      protected double threshold
      Threshold for voting process prediction
      protected boolean variable
      Indicates if the number of active labels is variable for each base classifier
      private int[] votesPerLabel
      Array with number of votes of the ensemble for each label

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnsembleClassifier

        public EnsembleClassifier(int maxSubsetSize,
                          int numClassifiers,
                          double threshold,
                          boolean variable,
                          mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner baseLearner,
                          byte[] genotype,
                          java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner> tableClassifiers,
                          net.sf.jclec.util.random.IRandGen randGen)
        Constructor with parameters
        Parameters:
        maxSubsetSize - Max number of labels in each base classifier. At the moment, the max is really the fixed number of labels
        numClassifiers - Number of classifier in the ensemble
        threshold - Prediction threshold
        variable - Indicates if the number of labels is variable or not for each base classifier (at the moment, only fixed has been proved)
        baseLearner - Type of multi-label learner used for EME. LP(J48) is proposed as default.
        genotype - Genotype of the individual
        tableClassifiers - Table storing the classifiers built
        randGen - Random numbers generator

      • EnsembleClassifier

        threshold - Prediction threshold
        variable - Indicates if the number of labels is variable or not for each base classifier (at the moment, only fixed has been proved)
        baseLearner - Type of multi-label learner used for EME. LP(J48) is proposed as default.
        genotype - Genotype of the individual
        tableClassifiers - Table storing the classifiers built
        randGen - Random numbers generator

      • isVariable

        public boolean isVariable()
        Get if the number of labels in each base classifier is variable At the moment, only the fixed version has been proved
        Returns:
        FALSE if the number of labels for each base classifier is fixed, and TRUE if it wold be variable

      • setVariable

        public void setVariable(boolean variable)
        Set variable value
        Parameters:
        variable - FALSE if the number of labels for each base classifier is fixed, and TRUE if it wold be variable

        protected java.lang.String getOrderedStringFromEnsembleMatrix()
        Get a String identifying the ensemble The base classifiers are ordered, in order to compare ensembles
        Returns:
        A string that identifies the ensemble, independently of the order of its base classifiers
